title: power_system_warning_red_indicator
summary: Power system warning indicator recorded before system shutdown.
description: Image records red warning indicator light on power control system signaling requirement to shut down electrical operation.

system_state.note: System indicates power limitation requiring shutdown. Continuous operation constrained by available energy.

reference_context.note: Referenced to power system opening time earlier the same day.

external_reference.note: External reference provided for independent verification.
